title: Beyonce Posted an Instagram Photo With Blue Using Snapchat Filters ‚Äî And Now Fans Are on the Hunt for Her Secret Account!
text:
A post shared by Beyonc√© (@beyonce) on Feb 23, 2017 at 2:07pm PST 
‚ÄúSo now we know Beyonc√© got a Snapchat,‚Äù one follower on Instagram commented, while another added: ‚ÄúOMG Beyonc√© has a snap.‚Äù 
In the cute pic, Bey and Blue look into the camera while sitting courtside during the 66th NBA All-Star Game in New Orleans, Louisiana, on Sunday, February 19. She captioned the Instagram with a simple ‚Äúüíï‚Äù emoji. Beyonce attends the New York Knicks vs Brooklyn Nets game at Barclays Center. James Devaney/WireImage 
The singer's post comes after she nearly broke the internet when she took to Instagram earlier this month to announce that she‚Äôs pregnant with twins. "We would like to share our love and happiness," the 22-time Grammy winner captioned a shot of herself holding her baby bump in a pink bra and pair of blue panties on February 1 to share she‚Äôs expecting with husband Jay Z . "We have been blessed two times over. We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes. - The Carters." Celebrity Selfies 
The Lemonade singer debuted her bump during her performance at the 2017 Grammys, but has since backed out of performing at Coachella this coming April . As previously reported, the songstress‚Äô doctor has advised against her headlining the festival in an effort to "keep a less rigorous schedule in the coming months." She's now scheduled to headline in 2018.
